item.description: I've got the week off from Friday, Feb. 24 (evening) into March. I was thinking of going to a warmer climate- right now I've got my eye on the Gulf Coast but I'm open to suggestions. I enjoy cultural venues, historic sites, shopping and 70-80 degrees, near the water would be a nice option. If you have the same time off and would like to try a four to five day stint, let me know.

group.name: Old and Not so Old Ladies Travel

item.name: February Break
